title: Danny Kelly of the Ringer on Seahawks plan for 2018 (Football 05/25)
description:
Danny Kelly of the Ringer joins Will Brinson to break down the Seahawks offseason and talk about their grand plans for 2018, how they will manufacture a run game, whether or not Brian Schottenheimer is an upgrade over Darrell Bevell, if Pete Carroll has control over this team, what the offense might look like, if the defense can be a sneaky good unit and much more.
